Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are eventually followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in cases that never reach Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Request Payment' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER versus those followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of re-submission loops after any rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that lead to a successful Payment Handled without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants where Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER appears, compared to variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed within the same case by a second Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (indicating resubmission)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE with case:Amount above 100 euros that result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that proceed to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER over those that proceed to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by any approval or rejection activity within 30 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in the top three most common process variants versus in variants involving Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that initiate a variant ending in Payment Handled without encountering any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are immediately succeeded by Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and then rejected
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of all Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that are preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (as first activity in the case)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person, compared to cases involving a pre-approver
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in domestic trip reimbursement claims versus pre-approved travel claims, in relation to subsequent rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE per STAFF MEMBER resource that later result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities grouped by the last value of org:resource filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE occurring in 2018 versus 2017, correlated with the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases
